description.fr:
Lorsqu'un personnage meurt\_:
{#push} les personnages adjacents\_<sprite name="cell_cross"> de {cell:c}.
description.en:
When a character dies:
{#push} the adjacent\_<sprite name="cell_cross"> characters {cell:c}.
description.es:
Cuando un personaje muere:
{#push} a los personajes adyacentes\_<sprite name="cell_cross"> a {cell:c}.
description.de:
Wenn ein Charakter stirbt:
{#push} die angrenzenden\_<sprite name="cell_cross"> Charaktere um {cell:c} zurück.
description.pt:
Quando um personagem morre:
{#push} os personagens adjacentes\_<sprite name="cell_cross"> por {cell:c}.
